articles.title: Australia's Queensland state could go into lockdown after cluster of coronavirus cases detected - CNN
articles.description: Australia's third-most populous state said on Saturday it may order a snap lockdown after a cluster of Covid-19 cases, as the country posted a record one-day rise in daily infections.
